name: Birthday of Alan Turing
description: Alan Turing, the father of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence, was born. He played a crucial role in breaking the Enigma code during World War II.

name: Birthday of Grace Hopper
description: Grace Hopper, an American computer scientist and United States Navy rear admiral, was born. She popularized the term 'debugging' for fixing computer glitches.

name: Birthday of Alan Turing
description: Alan Turing, the father of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence, was born. He played a crucial role in breaking the Enigma code during World War II.
